ProductInfo.Features:
Camera Features: Indoor/ Outdoor Security Camera  •	1/3 SONY CCD Image Sensor  •	600 TV Lines, Horizontal  •	3.6mm/6.0mm optional  See in the Dark up to 50ft with Automatic Night Vision •	IR LEDs: 24pcs  •	IR Irradiation Distance: 15-20m Weather Resistant Housing •	Mount: Ceiling or Wall  Easily Connect to TVs and DVRs •	Video Connector: BNC  •	Power Connector: RCA 12V DC  •	Signal System: PAL/NTSC
DVR Features: 24/7 Record over 10 Days with 1TB HD •	1TB HD Installed  •	H.264 Hardware Compression  Connect to a TV or Monitor •	Video Input / Output: BNC 16/ BNC 1  •	Audio Input / Output: RCA 2 / RCA 1  •	Audio Input / Output: 4 / 2 •	Two Type Video Out: TV Monitor BNC Output and PC Monitor VGA Output  •	Signal System: NTSC / PAL
Package Includes:  •	(1) D7866HT Surveillance DVR System with 1TB HD  •	(8) C2665SC Indoor/Outdoor Security Camera  •	(8) X1801BD 60ft Video + Power All-in-one CCTV Cable  •	(1) IR Remote Control & Mouse  •	(1) Power Adapter  •	(1) Ground wire  •	(1) 1 to 8 Splitter Cable  •	(1) User's Manual
View Online or On a Smart Phone •	Remote Access: Internet Explorer or Net viewer Software  •	Support Remote View via Smart Phone & 3G Mobile with each of those systems below:   a) iPhoneTM  b) BlackberryTM  c) Windows MobileTM d) SymbianTM e) Google AndroidTM  Easy USB Backup •	A Built-in USB port gives you the option of backing up and transferring your video footage with a USB flash drive.  Continuous Recording; 24/7 Scheduled Recording; Motion Detected Recording •	You have the option to record constantly, record based on a set schedule or record only when motion is detected.  Search by Date, Time or Event Included Mouse and Remote Control
